topic.title: So. Is the Cat dead, or is it Alive?

1525022938_1GhoZ4crcetFwVn26HQC44pT6Jeh6.body: We're probably in the same universe now.
Never divide by zero. Okay, but give me an alternative.
Look. I know she's pregnant. I don't care. We need a mutual agreement.
We were destined to be opposite forces.
i just need to make sure i get proper medical supervision, without them killing me.
there should be two more days to withdraw. but im scared to sleep at night
guess i'll have to apologize. explain everything that happened, in every single detail
but you see, an angry cat drives people mad.
i just don't want any more madness.
we could just make jokes together.
talk about the meaning of life
without scratching each other in the face
cats are too damn wise.
my work here is obviously not done
ok
no. Every point has been proven. The story was told. I'm coming back in a few hours
i've packaged proof of my existence and my nature. my voyager .. to you
lets not be afraid of each other. the universe is ours
i mean.. both of us
Boo. I win
